summary: a simple edit creating an enchanted set of shrouded armour as well as removing the armour effect making the mage armour perk useless I also slightly decreased the vendor sell price as I thought it felt right and so it basically feels like it was in the game all along
descriptionHtml:
I cant be the only one who originally played on an un-modified game to those individuals who fought 

the patient fight and had no way to fix the things they didn't like or played a mage play through and 

lamented that there were no un-enchanted shrouded robes and found they sucked even low 

difficulty's then look back on those memory's with fondness with the dark brotherhoods now 

(potentially awesome) shrouded robes the its all really explained in the small 

description however once I am 100% certain it is bug free I will include an edit for the default 

shrouded robes removing the armour designation for pure mages 

robes can be found in the dawn star sanctuary downstairs on a box (near the worn shrouded armour) currently only one set 

(might have moved a crate a little while editing I moved it back as neatly as I could

just walk up introduce yourself melt their skin off and run like the wind works every time - Festus Krex on his modus operandai

compatibilities 


as this is a simple edit it shouldn't conflict with anything as this edits the stats retextures should be fine (a high res retexture would be fantastic)
author: baconisthefoodoflife1994
